name: 4chan Yotsuba Green 2.0
description:
Based on BlauBernd's style, but modernized.

Thanks BlauBernd for creating this style in the first place.
Special thanks to the anons on /g/ for helping me out.

NB: you might need to add the homepage to your adblock whitelist otherwise it might be displayed incorrectly. I don't know why this is, if you know why let me know so I can update this style.
